title: The Crusades: saints and sinners
creator_contributor_role: Learning Corporation of America, production company
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/War - Religious aspects

description: Describes the first crusade, early in the 11th century, and the complex motives which led thousands of people to journey to the Holy Land. The climactic taking of Jerusalem is recreated, and the irony implicit in the concept of a holy war is examined.
